name: Intrinsic
headline: World-Class Tooling for Trust & Safety teams
description:
Build safer platforms with Intrinsic. Get access to the best safety technologies from one unified API. Enable your Trust & Safety team to tell cohesive stories from policy to product, to enforcement.

Michael and Karine first met two years ago at Apple’s Fraud Engineering, Algorithmic Risk team, which evolved to become Apple’s Trust & Safety function. We are both engineers and helped solve online abuse problems, including spam, botting, account security, and developer fraud for Apple’s customer base of over a billion users.
tags: industry:artificial-intelligence; industry:compliance; industry:cybersecurity; industry:enterprise-software; industry:trust-&-safety; location:san-francisco-bay-area

founders.name: Karine Mellata, Founder
founders.description:
Co-Founder at Intrinsic.

Making the internet safer, one line of code at a time.

founders.name: Michael Lin, Founder
founders.description: Co-founder of Intrinsic. Previous experience scaling online abuse solutions for hundreds of millions of users at Apple and Discord. Working to help make the internet a safer place for everyone.

# Moderate your firehose.With context, in realtime.
Moderate millions of events instantly across text, images, and videos with custom policies & a powerful decision-making engine
#### Real-time Detection
Leverage state-of-the-art models that have full context and understanding of your policies, in real-time
![](https://framerusercontent.com/images/Muj8Ty67V1RVDePnflpxNbWe4.png)
![](https://framerusercontent.com/images/Muj8Ty67V1RVDePnflpxNbWe4.png)
#### Automated Moderation
Reduces manual review workload, ensuring efficient & consistent policy enforcement
![](https://framerusercontent.com/images/Qg6Pu8bzV7udRRaH6y0STZNDo.png)
![](https://framerusercontent.com/images/Qg6Pu8bzV7udRRaH6y0STZNDo.png)

Empowers you with understandable insights, improving decision-making and trust
![](https://framerusercontent.com/images/xCiVlyjyvFCxUi5lgR1qAzFdNeU.png)
![](https://framerusercontent.com/images/xCiVlyjyvFCxUi5lgR1qAzFdNeU.png)
![](https://framerusercontent.com/images/xCiVlyjyvFCxUi5lgR1qAzFdNeU.png)
#### User Behavior Forensics

![](https://framerusercontent.com/images/thBioTCxWUq99Hzj0aofQKoK4A.png)
World Class Standards

# Future-Proof Moderation Simplified
Elevate your platform with high-speed, scalable moderation that evolves with your needs, ensuring content integrity and user safety with state-of-the-art detection systems and observability
Lightning speed
#### Automate & Scale
Automate moderation of text, images, & videos with a system that gets better with every moderated action
![](https://framerusercontent.com/images/Rjye1Zg04qnfk44TGIqiEEl4tRI.png)
![](https://framerusercontent.com/images/Rjye1Zg04qnfk44TGIqiEEl4tRI.png)
![](https://framerusercontent.com/images/Rjye1Zg04qnfk44TGIqiEEl4tRI.png)
Evolve & adapt to abuse
#### Monitor & Improve
Manage review queues and escalations easily with fine-grained RBAC permissions
![](https://framerusercontent.com/images/n330DMoVfzBYzmKj5ZRBTegwguo.png)
![](https://framerusercontent.com/images/n330DMoVfzBYzmKj5ZRBTegwguo.png)

Tailored to your workflows
#### Custom Moderation
Make data-driven decisions from performance reports and platform-wide health monitoring
Designed for scale
#### Enterprise Grade
Get access to advanced security, AI-powered analytics, and comprehensive information governance

generated_description:
### Intrinsic Overview

**Website:** [withintrinsic.com](https://withintrinsic.com)  
**Founded:** 2022  
**Location:** San Francisco, California  
**Team Size:** 8 employees  
**Y Combinator Batch:** W23  
**Funding Raised:** $3.1 million in Seed Funding

#### Mission
Intrinsic’s mission is to provide world-class tooling for Trust & Safety teams. They aim to revolutionize how organizations build safer platforms by providing access to top-notch safety technologies through a single, unified API. This enables Trust & Safety teams to craft cohesive narratives spanning policy to product enforcement.

#### Founders
Michael and Karine, both experienced engineers, met at Apple while tackling online abuse challenges such as spam, botting, account security, and developer fraud for a user base exceeding one billion. Their unique expertise forms the backbone of Intrinsic's mission.

#### What They Do
Intrinsic offers advanced content moderation solutions that empower Trust & Safety teams to manage incidents effectively and efficiently. Key features include:

- **Real-time Detection:** Leverage sophisticated models capable of understanding complex policies in real-time.
- **Automated Moderation:** Significantly reduces manual review workloads, ensuring consistent policy enforcement without compromising efficiency.
- **User Behavior Forensics:** Enable deeper insights into user activities through time-series and graph analysis.

#### Performance Metrics
- 100x faster review times.
- 98.3% detection accuracy.
- Moderating 100 million events daily.
- Protecting over 1 billion users every day.

#### Product Offerings
Intrinsic provides two primary solutions:
1. **Content Moderation:** Advanced tools for moderating text, images, and videos on various platforms.
2. **Workflow Tooling:** Tailored tools designed to fit seamlessly into existing review workflows, enhancing both human and automated reviews.

#### Industry Tags
- Artificial Intelligence
- Compliance
- Cybersecurity
- Enterprise Software
- Trust & Safety
- San Francisco Bay Area

#### Notable Partnerships
Jared Friedman serves as a Group Partner, ensuring strong mentorship and guidance for the team’s growth and strategic direction.

#### Recent Media Exposure
Intrinsic has gained media traction for its innovative approach. Press coverage highlights its mission to build critical infrastructure for Trust & Safety teams, marking its emergence as a leader in the field.

#### Connect with Intrinsic
For those looking to explore their tools or inquire about their offerings, demos are available via their website, and they encourage conversations directly with the founders.

Intrinsic appears poised to make a significant impact in the realm of online safety, harnessing technology to foster safer digital environments for users worldwide. If you're in the tech space and think safety is paramount, Intrinsic is worth watching.
